message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be a great fit for your needs and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have. I'm asking for $15,000 for it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, my budget is limited and I am only able to offer $12,000 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I see the value it would bring you, however, I can't let it go for less than $13,500.  What do you say?
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $13,000 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
